text: Ah okay. I've been merging to `master` this whole time (oops). Maybe it's time to make `develop` branches for all the repos, as I work on them, then?

text: My method is to have a default branch `dev` that's the final staging before merging things into the `release` branch, which is what I register with the registrator bot.
